# Hacktoberfest 2022 - JavaScript Easy Programs

## To Do List

### Description
This program is used to create a To Do List. The user can add items to the list, delete items from the list and mark items as completed. The list is stored in the local storage of the browser.

### Image Example
![To Do List](data:image/png;base64,)
